title: Downton Abbey's Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes finally tie the knot! See the pictures here
text:
Downton Abbey's Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes finally tie the knot! See the pictures here Downton Abbey's Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes finally tie the knot! See the pictures here 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
It’s been a slow-burning relationship, but fans will finally get to see Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes tie the knot in the latest Downton Abbey episode. 
Viewers watched their friendship through the series turn into affection, bashful flirtation and finally a heart-warming romance. (Nick Briggs/ITV) 
Carson proposed to Mrs Hughes in last year’s Christmas special, ending a long wait for hopeful fans. 
Now, as the popular ITV show nears the end of its run, the couple will make it official in an intimate ceremony, attended by their friends and family from the estate. (Nick Briggs/ITV) 
The butler and head housekeeper made a stylish couple in complimentary mauve and grey. 
Mr Carson (Jim Carter) looked like the cat that had got the cream, beaming in a dapper three-piece suit as he clutched on to his new wife outside the church. (Nick Briggs/ITV) 
Mrs Hughes, played by Phyllis Logan, smiled broadly in a beaded mauve coat, dress and hat, while holding a beautiful bouquet of flowers. 
There’s no word yet on whether any lucky lady catches Mrs Hughes’ bouquet, but there were certainly many options in the pews. (Nick Briggs/ITV) 
Violet Crawley, the Dowager Countess, paid her good wishes to the couple alongside Lord and Lady Grantham, Lady Mary and Lady Edith. (Nick Briggs/ITV) 
Among the household staff celebrating were close friend Mrs Patmore, Daisy Mason, Moseley, Gladys Denker and the happily married Mr and Mrs Bates. (Nick Briggs/ITV) 
Viewers can watch the wedding on October 4. Get your tissues ready. Promoted Stories
